Get the base API response for a data set's meta data

get_meta_response.Rd

Get the metadata information for a data set available from the EES API.

Usage

get_meta_response(
  dataset_id,
  dataset_version = NULL,
  api_version = NULL,
  parse = TRUE,
  verbose = FALSE
)

Arguments

dataset_id

ID of data set to be connected to. This is required if the endpoint is one of "get-summary", "get-meta", "get-data" or "post-data"

dataset_version

Version of data set to be connected to

api_version

EES API version

parse

Parse result into structured list

verbose

Run with additional contextual messaging, logical, default = FALSE

Value

Results of query to API meta data endpoint

Examples

get_meta_response(example_id())
#> $filters
#>      id             column              label hint
#> 1 tu1Em establishment_type establishment type     
#> 2 f2GYF               type               type     
#>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         options
#> 1                                                                                                                                                                                                                            9RpY4, 23odl, Poz7e, NwcLD, wEZcb, o4vFm, Academy Converter, Academy Sponsor Led, Community School, Independent School, Sixth Form College, Voluntary Aided School
